column4: I have a canon powershot, and I'm having trouble viewing it as a mounted volume, meaning other than using shotwell I cant view it in the file manager, any suggestions?
are you able to browse it?
I have same problem since updating Ubuntu, it USED TO work fine as a mounted volume, now I have to use F-Spot browser first, then it allows me to access camera as a drive
can you access it as a drive when you use Shotwell?
try F-Spot then that at least mounts it and makes it appear as a drive, its not so bad having to start F-Spot as it allows you to thumbnail view/transfer the pics anyway
yea f-spot doesn't even detect it
did you go into Choose folder..
yea says choose folder and under that no camera detected
yea =/ I unplugged it shut it off and plugged it back in
damn, what model cam do you have? let me try mine just to make sure I never missed anything
